meanings.definition: An ache or pain in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, I got a stomachache.
meanings.sent2: She stayed home from school because of a stomachache.
meanings.sent3: The stomachache from eating too many sweets made him regret his choices.
meanings.sent4: Her stomachache felt like a tiny monster gnawing at her insides.
meanings.sent5: The stomachache was a sharp reminder to eat more vegetables.

meanings.definition: To experience pain or discomfort in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: I stomachache after eating too quickly.
meanings.sent2: He stomachaches every time he drinks milk.
meanings.sent3: The thought of broccoli makes me stomachache.
meanings.sent4: Her nervousness stomachached as she waited for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The spicy food stomachached him for hours.
